abstract.shortdesc: In this tutorial, you learned how to complete the end-to-end process of planning, preparing, and serving a peanut butter and jelly sandwich feast.

tutorialSummaryBody.lessonsLearned:
Lessons learnedBy completing this tutorial, you learned about the following concepts and tasks:
The importance of proper menu selection
The importance of list-making during the planning and preparation phases
The value of presentation
The ingredients and supplies that are required for a PB&J meal
tutorialSummaryBody.assessment:
AssessmentYou should be able to answer the following questions:
What is a menu?
Why should you make lists of ingredients and supplies?
What are the steps for preparing and serving a PB&J sandwich?
